title: Stones River National Battlefield: Geologic Formations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems     Geologic Formations                Geologic Formations          Geologic formations played a significant role in the stories on the battlefield landscape. Native American uses, farming and settlement patterns, and the movement of troops and equipment were shaped by the Stones River and the surrounding Karst topography. Geologic Resources Inventory Report
